document.full_text: the operator of japan's crippled nuclear plant said wednesday it was still working on a detailed plan to end the country's nuclear crisis a month after it began, as tests showed radiation levels in the sea near the complex had spiked.
document.title: tepco still working on plan to end japan nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: the operator of japan's crippled nuclear plant said wednesday it was still working on a detailed plan to end the country's nuclear crisis a month after it began, as tests showed radiation levels in the sea near the complex had spiked.
